google_play_reviews.content: Napaka husay
Google is complaining the app is not following the security policies for OAuth use (access to Google Drive)
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Yeah, unfortunately Google "recently" changed their policies... It's pretty hard to implement it to work on all platforms because they have different requirements for mobile, web and desktop, and i don't have the resources to implement everything three times separately.. maybe have to drop support for Google drive ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

google_play_reviews.content: A perfect balance between security and convenience.
Good KeePass port for synchronization. The interface is confusing at first but works. Useful for those who want to share their database between devices.

I dont know why there are so many poor reviews.... This is one of my favourite apps.... Cherry on the top being opensource... May be most people using this are active on Github and fdroid.. Any way i can donate through google play?
KeePass for mobile that doesn't compromise as much on features as other mobile KeePass variants
I like it but autofill service appears to be borked. Very inconsistent.
Add auto lock feature.
Seamlessly opened and worked with my KeePass local database.
Not all devices have fingerprint feature including mine, and I want to import ( .csv ) file from Bitwarden to Authpass I don't know how to do that (if there is a way to import .csv file.)
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. You can use fingerprint to unlock the database, if you device supports it, this way you don't have to enter the password every time. Re import, please post in the forum with an example file how you would like to import. Fwiw, you can use any other keepass compatible app to do the import.(btw, 1 ‚≠ê is not very encouraging)

google_play_reviews.content: I very much wanted to like this app, and I do in terms of the UI and usability, but unfortunately it suffers the same problem as another app I've tried to work with my Keepass files stored in Nextcloud - no offline access for when I don't have access to Nextcloud. Sadly a show stopper for me.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: If you are offline, it *should* use the latest cashed version ü§î please get in contact if this does not work.. or write in https://forum.authpass.app

google_play_reviews.content: There are subscription based tools half as good, and this one is free, open source, and has cloud support. It's getting polished everyday, and now I can say goodbye to Roboform and Lastpass. This does need some more polishing but it's still in it's infancy. At this point it's fully usable offline, or using your own cloud service. Devs seem to be very motivated and really improving this daily. Will be happy to donate when the time will come. Looking forward to every update. Good luck devs!
Need more improvement in ui. Ui is hard to understand. I am always forgot which option is where and which one do what things.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback. Please let us know in the forum or by email about specifics. Hard to improve without knowing specific painpoints. Thanks. https://forum.authpass.app/ - either "Experience" or "Feature Discussions" category should fit, depending on the discussing topic. Looking forward to hear your suggestions.

google_play_reviews.content: Love this app! I'm having problems with the autofill service however. The prompt showed up as I'm writing this comment, which is obviously not a password field. I also reported another problem on GitHub. Can you change the way website icons behave so that we can change the automatically loaded icon to a custom one (once an icon is loaded from the web it can't be changed, I have to turn it off for all icons. I want to keep it turned on, and only replace the icons that don't look good.) Thank you
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your kind review. I have seen your GitHub issue. Unfortunately the Autofill APIs aren't trivial and require a bit of tweaking. Please create another issue regarding changing of icons, to make followups easier. Thanks!

google_play_reviews.content: New 1.8.2 stopped accepting password I set up for 1.8.1!? P. S. I exported db again now with the name without spaces, and now 1.8.2 works.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi, sorry for the troubles. But it is very unlikely that this is the cause. (all versions are even compatible with all other Keepass clients, so you could just as well open it with Keepass, or Keeweb, etc. so this doesn't change from one version to another). What is the exact error message you? Please visit the forum or contact support to get help.

google_play_reviews.replyContent: Sorry that AuthPass is not what you are looking for. On the off chance that you have something productive to say feel free to leave your suggestions for improvements in our forum https://forum.authpass.app/c/feature-discussions/7

google_play_reviews.content: A great project that is constantly improving. Still not perfect but getting very close üòâ

google_play_reviews.content: Works very nicely, very happy with it
Excellent manager, really easy to use and secure.
